mpa_notes: Primary acquisition metric. LTV must justify CAC.
FLAWED AS PRIMARY KPI. Challenge if used alone. Does not account for incrementality.
Preferred to standard ROAS. Requires incrementality testing. True value measurement.
Blended metric for portfolio view. Better than channel ROAS. Target 3x to 8x depending on margin.
Optimal varies by objective. Typically 2-5 for awareness.
Vanity metric unless paired with quality.
Competitive metric. SOV above SOM drives growth. Binet and Field research supports ESOV investment.
Emerging metric. Adelaide and Lumen are leading providers. Better outcome predictor than viewability.

mpa_formula: Avg Revenue per Customer * Avg Customer Lifespan

mpa_notes: Critical for retail media. Amazon and Walmart report NTB. Measures true acquisition.
MFA sites offer low value. Target below 5%.
Survey-based metric. Requires brand lift study. Measures awareness when prompted with brand name.
Survey-based metric. Requires brand lift study. Measures mid-funnel brand health.
Survey-based metric. Requires brand lift study. Lower-funnel brand metric.
Calculated from brand lift studies. Measures incremental brand impact. Requires test and control.

mpa_formula: Sum of All Fees / Gross Spend * 100
Fee Savings Pct - (Effectiveness Loss Pct * Weight)

mpa_notes: True measure of campaign value. Requires geo or holdout testing. Gold standard for measurement.
True acquisition cost accounting for incrementality. Higher but more accurate than standard CAC.
